contributors.name: Rachel-Rose O'Leary
contributors.desc: Rachel-Rose Oâ€™Leary is a core dev at lunarpunk layer 1, DarkFi. She is also co-editor of the philosophy journal Agorism in the 21st Century. As a writer she has published in egirlcapital, CoinDesk, Defiant, Wired and elsewhere under anonymous accounts. She believes privacy is necessary for communities to define their own destinies.
